item.title: Airbnb - Regression Model
item.description: AirBnB analytics - Beijing Introduction The following project focuses on the analysis of an AirBnB dataset. A data cleaning has been firstly conducted to ensure reliable data. The output of the is a multivariate regression model that predicts the total cost of two people to stay at an AirBnB property in Beijing for 4 nights. Executive summary The dataset obtained from airBnB contained a vast amount of information which allows for the development of a broad range of insights into the operations of airBnB in Beijing.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
